newsArray.title: England Cricket World Cup winner steps down and flees to Dubai after attacks on family home
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Phil Blanche)
newsArray.description: James Vince, part of the England squad that won the 2019 Cricket World Cup on home soil, had his house and car attacked last year and said his young family were left fearing for their safety

newsArray.title: PCB going to Include Saim Ayub in Champions Trophy despite Injury
creator: Krishnakant Kukreti
newsArray.description: Pakistani opener Saim Ayub is currently on his way to recover from an injury, and still the Pakistan selectors have decided to name him in the squad for Champions Trophy. A report has claimed that this decision was taken as the selectors thought they can bring in a replacement in case Saim is not fit till the date of tournament.The post PCB going to Include Saim Ayub in Champions Trophy despite Injury appeared first on Cricket Country.

newsArray.title: Why are ECB and county cricketers clashing over T20 leagues?
newsArray.description: Hampshire's James Vince has quit red-ball cricket for 2025 and taken up a lucrative Pakistan Super League deal, with the ECB having made it clear they are to clamp down on players pursuing franchise T20 contracts while on red-ball deals with their counties.

newsArray.title: VIDEO: RCB ने ऑक्शन में जिसपर बहाया पानी की तरफ पैसा, उसका बोल्ड होने का तरीका देख हैरान हो जाएंगे आप
newsArray.description: Adam Milne Bowled Phil Salt: ILT20 के छठवें मुकाबले में जिस तरह से फिल साल्ट को एडम मिल्ने ने बोल्ड किया है. उसे देख आरसीबी की टीम कुछ खास खुश नहीं हो रही होगी.
